title: White Radiant Wukong Bug
body:
Hey 

I know by now that Riot Games has gotten a few Reports about a particular Wukong skin bug where Radiant Wukong turns completely white very similar to the end of wukong death animation.

It would be amazing if this skin could be kept as it is now with this bug, because its simply too cool not t. It also suits the Radiant wukong so well as if he been re-incarnated. 

I know this is just my personal opinion but I hope my voice counts 

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey, thanks for the report! 

Unfortunately, this is a bug, and something that will be fixed next patch. For context, the death VFX that turn him to stone weren't set to turn off once he revived, resulting in the overlay persisting. ;-;
